question_en: fee structure
answer_en:
Here is the fee structure for all major branches at KIPM College:

B.Tech (Engineering):
- Computer Science & Engineering: ₹74,712/year
- Mechanical Engineering: ₹60,000/year
- Civil Engineering: ₹90,000/year
- Electrical Engineering: ₹74,712/year
- Electronics & Communication Engineering: ₹74,712/year

Diploma (Polytechnic):
- Mechanical Engineering: ₹45,000/year
- Civil Engineering: ₹45,000/year
- Electrical Engineering: ₹45,000/year

MBA (Master of Business Administration):
- All Specializations: ₹85,000/year

B.Pharm (Pharmacy):
- Bachelor of Pharmacy: ₹1,05,000/year

D.Pharm (Diploma in Pharmacy):
- Diploma in Pharmacy: ₹75,000/year

For the most accurate and updated fee details, please visit the official website or contact the admission office.
question_hi: KIPM ka fee structure kya hai?
answer_hi:
Yeh hai KIPM College ke sabhi major branches ka fee structure:

B.Tech (Engineering):
- Computer Science & Engineering: ₹74,712/saal
- Mechanical Engineering: ₹60,000/saal
- Civil Engineering: ₹90,000/saal
- Electrical Engineering: ₹74,712/saal
- Electronics & Communication Engineering: ₹74,712/saal

Diploma (Polytechnic):
- Mechanical Engineering: ₹45,000/saal
- Civil Engineering: ₹45,000/saal
- Electrical Engineering: ₹45,000/saal

MBA (Master of Business Administration):
- Sabhi Specializations: ₹85,000/saal

B.Pharm (Pharmacy):
- Bachelor of Pharmacy: ₹1,05,000/saal

D.Pharm (Diploma in Pharmacy):
- Diploma in Pharmacy: ₹75,000/saal

Latest fee details ke liye official website dekhein ya admission office se sampark karein.

answer_en: Eligibility for B.Tech: 10+2 with Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics. For MBA: Graduation in any discipline. For Diploma: 10th pass.
